# Getting Started

## Installation

### From PyPI

```bash
uv pip install tide-GPR
```

or

```bash
pip install tide-GPR
```

### From Source

```bash
git clone https://github.com/vcholerae1/tide.git
cd tide
uv build
```

Requirements:
- Python >= 3.12
- PyTorch >= 2.9.1
- CUDA Toolkit (optional, for GPU support)
- CMake >= 3.28 (optional, for building from source)
